records.note: Sigfried is a 8-year-old from china male diagnosed with acute lymphoblastic leukemia.

Sigfried is a 8-year-old chinese male diagnosed with ALL. Childhood acute lymphoblastic leukemia (also called ALL or acute lymphocytic leukemia) is a cancer of the blood and bone marrow. This type of cancer usually gets worse quickly if it is not treated.
Sigfried is a 8-year-old chinese male diagnosed with ALL. He has a second cancer.
